text: Los Olvidados (, Spanish for "The Forgotten Ones"), known in the U.S. as The Young and the Damned, is a 1950 Mexican crime drama movie directed by Luis Buñuel and stars Alfonso Mejía, Stella Inda, Miguel Inclán, Roberto Cobo. It was Koch-Lorber Films. ==Other websites== * Category:1950 crime drama movies Category:Mexican crime movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Spanish- language movies Category:Movies directed by Luis Buñuel Category:Movies about runaways Category:Movies set in Mexico
title: Los Olvidados
